title: INSANE DEAL --- Beautiful, Renovated, Big 2 Bed - He/Hw
posting_body: ['Wonderful 2 Bed 1 bath on Englewood Ave in Cleveland Circle / Brighton', 'Only $2400!', 'Heat and hot water included!', 'Available for Sept 1st move in', 'High Quality Apartment', 'Large living room', 'Large equal sized bedrooms', 'Newly renovated kitchen with granite countertops, new cabinets, new Bosch dishwasher and much more', 'Hardwood floors', '2 Ceiling Fans', 'Ample closet space', 'Second floor unit with elevator in building', 'Laundry in complex', 'Common Roof Deck in complex', 'Amazing location - very close to Green Line C, D & B', 'Will not last!', 'Very Rare Listing, will not find anything similar in Cleveland Circle', 'For showings, email patrick @ <URL> (no spaces) or text your email address to 508.243.5319', 'If interested please: when reaching out include a brief description, students or working, what you do for work, etc.', 'Patrick Gray', 'Metro Realty Corp', '508-243-5319', 'Also, feel free to check out my Youtube Channel for full video walkthroughs of several apartments in Boston, Brighton, Brookline and more.', 'New videos are added frequently, copy and paste link below or search Patrick Gray Real Estate on Youtube', 'https www youtube com channel UCdhMp_yHF3SmPQ8YS4-b9kQ']
